latex:
The eighth grade class at Lincoln Middle School has $93$ students. Each student takes a math class or a foreign language class or both. There are $70$ eighth graders taking a math class, and there are $54$ eighth graders taking a foreign language class. How many eighth graders take \textit{only} a math class and \textit{not} a foreign language class?\\
\\
\\
$\textbf{(A) }16\qquad
\textbf{(B) }23\qquad
\textbf{(C) }31\qquad
\textbf{(D) }39\qquad
\textbf{(E) }70\qquad$
